username.label: Choose a username
username.hint: Choose your name carefully, it can't be changed.

errors.minlength: Username must be at least {{ requiredLength }} characters long
errors.maxlength: Username cannot be more than {{ requiredLength }} characters long
errors.alreadyExists: That username is taken. Try another

displayName.label: Choose a display name
displayName.hint: Don't worry, you can change this one anytime.
